Mythos Cards.name: A Strange Plague
Mythos Cards.description: Investigators cannot gain Stamina except by receiving medical care in St. Mary's Hospital (or from Vincent Lee).

Mythos Cards.name: Alien Technology
Mythos Cards.description: Mi-Go have their toughness increased by 2. If an investigator passes a Combat check against a Mi-Go, he draws 1 extra Unique Item.

Mythos Cards.name: No One Can Help you Now
Mythos Cards.description: Gates cannot be sealed, although they can still be closed.

Mythos Cards.name: Gangs Clean Up Easttown!
Mythos Cards.description: All monsters in the Easttown streets or locations are returned to the cup.

Mythos Cards.name: Private Security Hired in Uptown!
Mythos Cards.description: All monsters in the Uptown streets or locations are returned to the cup.

Mythos Cards.name: Sunny and Clear
Mythos Cards.description:
Sneak checks in Arkham are made at a -1 penalty.
Will checks in Arkham are made at a +1 bonus.
If the haunter in Darkness is in play, return it to the cup. If the Haunter in the Darkness enters play, return it to the cup and draw a different monster.

Mythos Cards.name: Slum Murders Continue!
Mythos Cards.description: An old basement is opened, releasing 2 monsters in the Easttown streets.

Mythos Cards.name: Manhunt in Arkham!
Mythos Cards.description: An old basement is opened, releasing 2 monsters in the Easttown streets.

Mythos Cards.name: Miskatonic Arctic Expedition Returns!
Mythos Cards.description: Any Elder Things previously claimed as monster trophies by players return to life and are placed in the River Docks.

Mythos Cards.name: City Gripped by Blackouts!
Mythos Cards.description:
The General Store, Curiositie Shoppe, and Ye Olde Magice Shoppe are closde until the end of next turn. Leave this card in play until then to indicate this.

Close:


The General Store
Curiositie Shoppe
Ye Olde Magick Shoppe

Mythos Cards.name: Fourth of July Parade!
Mythos Cards.description: Investigators cannot move into or out of the Merchant District streets until the end of next turn. Leave this card in play until then to indicate this.

Mythos Cards.name: Bizarre Dreams Plague Citizens!
Mythos Cards.description: All Gugs and Nightgaunts in Arkham are returned to the cup. If at least one monster returns to the cup, raise the terror level by 1.

Mythos Cards.name: The Festival
Mythos Cards.description: The festival has begun! Cultists and Byakhee have their toughness increased by 1.

Mythos Cards.name: Police Step Up Patrols in Northside!
Mythos Cards.description: All monsters in the Northside streets or locations are returned to the cup.

Mythos Cards.name: Rivertown Residents Take Back Streets!
Mythos Cards.description: All monsters in the Rivertown streets or locations are returned to the cup.

Mythos Cards.name: Blue Flu!
Mythos Cards.description: All investigators in jail are released. No investigators may be arrested until the end of the next turn. Leave this card in play until then to indicate this

Mythos Cards.name: Picnickers Panic!
Mythos Cards.description: A careless picnicker unleashes 2 monsters onto the Downtown streets.

Mythos Cards.name: Temperance Fever Sweeps City!
Mythos Cards.description: Any investigator with Whiskey must pass a Sneak (-1) check or get arrested and taken to the Police Station. If this occurs, in addition, Hibb's Roadhouse is closeduntil the end of next turn. Leave this card in play until then to indicate this.

Mythos Cards.name: Raining Cats and Dogs
Mythos Cards.description:
Speed checks in Arkham are made at a -1 penalty, and players receive 1 less movement point during the Movement Phase.
Sneak checks in Arkham are made at a +1 bonus.
Return any Fire Vampires in play to the cup. If a Fire Vampire enteres play, return it to the cup and draw a differnt monster.

Mythos Cards.name: Things of Darkness
Mythos Cards.description: Ghouls, Formless Spawns, Shoggoths, and Flying Polyps have their toughness increased by 1.

Mythos Cards.name: Family Found Butchered!
Mythos Cards.description: The terror level increases by 1 in light of this tragic news.

Mythos Cards.name: Strange Power Flux Plagues City!
Mythos Cards.description: All investigators in Other World areas may immediately return to Arkham.

Mythos Cards.name: Darke's Carnival Arrives
Mythos Cards.description:
Investigators who end their movement in the Northside streets gain 1 Clue token from the sinister wonders they witness, but must pass a Will (-1) check or lose 1 Sanity.

Activity At:


Northside Streets

Mythos Cards.name: Sheldon Gang Turns to Police for Aid!
Mythos Cards.description: The Sheldon Gang disturbs a burial mound, releasing 2 monster into the Uptown streets.

Mythos Cards.name: Church Group Reclaims Southside!
Mythos Cards.description: All monster in the Southside streets or locations are returned to the cup.

Mythos Cards.name: Icy Conditions
Mythos Cards.description:
Investigators receive 1 less movement point during the Movement Phase.
Fast monsters move like normal monsters.

Mythos Cards.name: Merchants March on Crime!
Mythos Cards.description: All monsters in the Merchant District streets or locations are returned to the cup.

Mythos Cards.name: Goat-like Creature Spotted in Woods!
Mythos Cards.description: All Dark Young in Arkham are returned to the cup. If at least one monster returns to the cup, raise the terror level by 1.

Mythos Cards.name: An Evil Fog
Mythos Cards.description:
Will checks in Arkham are made at a -1 penalty.
Sneak checks in Arkham are made at a +1 bonus.
Fliers do not move.

Clue Appears At:

Unvisited Isle

Mythos Cards.name: Southside Strangler Suspected!
Mythos Cards.description: However, the press is mistaken, and the murders were caused by 2 monsters that are released into the Ssouthside streets.

Mythos Cards.name: The Man in Black
Mythos Cards.description:
Investigators who end their movement in the French Hill streets may deal with the Man in Black to gain power. They roll dice equal to their current Sanity, and for every failed die, they lose 1 Sanity. If this reduces them to 0 Sanity, they are devoured and the player must start a new character. Otherwise, they gian 1 Clue token and draw 1 Spell.
Activity At:
French Hill streets

Mythos Cards.name: Ill Wind Grips Arkham!
Mythos Cards.description: The first player must pass a Luck(-1) check or be Cursed.

Mythos Cards.name: Vigilante Guards the Night!
Mythos Cards.description: All monsters in the Downtown streets or locations are returned to the cup.

Mythos Cards.name: Lodge Members Watch the Night!
Mythos Cards.description: All monsters in the French Hill streets or locations are returned to the cup.

Mythos Cards.name: Planetary Alignment
Mythos Cards.description: Thanks to the mystic energy generated by the planetary alignment, all spells have a Sanity cost of 0.

Mythos Cards.name: Ghost Ship Docks by Itself!
Mythos Cards.description: An ancient ghost ship arrives in Arkham, releasing 2 monsters into the Merchant Distric Streets.

Mythos Cards.name: The Stars Are Right
Mythos Cards.description:
Rumor
Ongoing Effect: Roll a die at the end of every Mythos Phase while this card in in play (beginning the turn after it entered play). On a 1 or a 2, place one doom token on the ancient one's doom track.
Pass: If a player discards an Ally card while in the Downtown streets during the Arkham Encounter Phase, return this card to the box. Each player draws 2 Common Items.
Fail: If the Ancient One awakens, return this card to the box.
Activity At:
Downtown Streets

Mythos Cards.name: The Stars Are Right
Mythos Cards.description: Investigators who end their movement in the Uptwon streets may draw 2 Unique Items and purchase one, none, or both of them at list price, discarding any that are not purchased.

Mythos Cards.name: Dreams of a Sunken City
Mythos Cards.description: Investigators cannot gain Sanity except by receiving psychiatric care at Arkham Asylum (or from Carolyn Fern).

Mythos Cards.name: Blackest Night
Mythos Cards.description:
Luck checks in Arkham are made at a -1 penalty.
Sneak checks in Arkham are made at a +1 bonus.

Mythos Cards.name: Big Storm Sweeps Arkham
Mythos Cards.description: All monsters in the Sky and Outskirts are returned to the cup.

Mythos Cards.name: Noden's Favor
Mythos Cards.description: It costs 2 fewer Clue tokens to seal gates.

Mythos Cards.name: R'lyeh Rising
Mythos Cards.description:
Star Spawns and Maniacs have their toughness increased by 1
The difficulty to seal or close gates to R'lyeh is increased by 1.

Mythos Cards.name: The Southside Stranagler Strikes
Mythos Cards.description:
Rumor
Ongoing Effect: Return one Ally from the Ally deck to the box at random at the end of every Mythos Phase while this card is in play (beginning the turn after it entered play). The Southside Strangler has struck again!
Pass: I a single player discards 5 Clue tokens while in Ma's Boarding House during the Arkham Encouneter Phase, return this cards to the box. Each player gains $5 as a reward fro the police.
Fail: if there are no Allies to return to the box at the end of the Mythos Phase, return this card to the box. Each player must lower either their maximum Sanity or Stamina (their choice) by 1 for the rest of the game.
Activity At:
Southside Streets

Mythos Cards.name: All Quiet in Arkham!
Mythos Cards.description: Each player may pass a Luck (-1) check to be Blessed.

Mythos Cards.name: Heat Wave
Mythos Cards.description:
Fight checks in Arkham are made at a -1 penalty.
Lore checks in Arkham are made at a +1 bonus.
Fire Vampires have their toughness increased by 1.

Mythos Cards.name: Solar Eclipse
Mythos Cards.description: Due to the interference of the solar eclipse, no spell may be cast.

Mythos Cards.name: Curfew Enforced
Mythos Cards.description: Any investigators who end their movement in the streets must pass a Will (+0) check or be arrested and taken to the Plice Station.

Mythos Cards.name: Feds Raid Arkham!
Mythos Cards.description: All monsters in the street are returned to the cup.

Mythos Cards.name: Witch Burning Anniversary!
Mythos Cards.description: An ancient curse strikes Arkham, releasing 2 monsters into the Rivertown streets.

Mythos Cards.name: Terror at the Train Station!
Mythos Cards.description: A rusty train arrives in Arkham, disgorging 2 monsters into the Northside streets.

Mythos Cards.name: The Great Ritual
Mythos Cards.description:
Rumor
Ongoing Effect: Cultists, Witches, Warlocks, and High Priests have their toughness increased by 2 while this card is in play.
Place 1 Clue token on this card at the end of every Mythos Phase (beginning the turn after it entered play).
Pass: If a single player discards 3 spells (4 if there are 5 or more players) while in the French Hill streets during the Arkham encounter Phase, return this card to the box. Each player gains 2 Clue tokens.
Fail: If there are ever 5 Clue tokens on this card, return it to the box. From now on, draw 2 Mythos card each Mythos Phase. Ignore everything on the first card except for the gate opening.
Activity At:
French Hill Streets

Mythos Cards.name: Egyptian Exhibit Visits Miskatonic U.
Mythos Cards.description:
Any investigator who end their movement in the Miskatonic U. streets may pass a Lore (-1) check to gian 1 Clue token by reading the strange heiroglyphics on the artifacts in the exhibit.
Activity At:
Miskatonic U. Streets

Mythos Cards.name: Happy Days are Here Again
Mythos Cards.description: Due to the renewed propserity that has come to Arkham, the terror level cannot increase.

Mythos Cards.name: Disturbing the Dead
Mythos Cards.description:
Ongoing Effect: Roll a die at the end of every Mythos Phase while this card is in play (beginning the turn after it entered play). On a 1 or 22, increase the terror level by 1.
Pass: If a single player discards 2 gate trophies during the Arkham Encounter Phase while in the Rivertown streets, return this card to the box. Each player draws 1 Spell.
Fail: if the terror lelve reaches 10, return this card to the box. Every investigator is Cursed.
Activity At:
Rivertown Streets

Mythos Cards.name: Campus Security Increased!
Mythos Cards.description: All monsters in the Miskatonic U. streets or locations are returned to the cup.

Mythos Cards.name: Scientist Warns of Dimensional Rift!
Mythos Cards.description: All Dimensional Shamblers and Hounds of Tindalos in Arkham are returned to the cup. If at least one monster returns to the cup, raise the terror level by 1.

Mythos Cards.name: Strange Lights on Campus!
Mythos Cards.description:
The Library, Administration Building, and Science Building are all closed until the end of next turn. Leave this card in play until then to indicate this.
Close:
Administration Building
Library
Science Building

Mythos Cards.name: Strange Lights on Campus!
Mythos Cards.description: The Library, Administration Building, and Science Building are all closed until the end of next turn. Leave this card in play until then to indicate this.

Mythos Cards.name: Good Work Undone
Mythos Cards.description:
When this card enters play, place 6 Clue tokens on it. Any player may spend Clue tokens during the Arkham Encounter Phase while in the Easttown streets to discard Clue tokens from this card on a 1-for-1 basis.
Ongoing Effect: Roll two die at the end of every Mythos Phase while this card is in play (beginning the turn after it entered play). For every 1 or 2 rolled, place 1 Clue token on this card.
Pass: If there are no Clue tokens on this card, return it to the box. Each player draws 1 Unique Item.
Fail: If there are 10 Clue tokens on this card, return it to the box. All elder sign tokens are removed from the board.
Activity At:
Easttown Streets

Mythos Cards.name: Missing People Return!
Mythos Cards.description: All investigators currenlty lost in time and space immediately reutrn to Arkham, appearing in a street or location of their choice.

Mythos Cards.name: The Story Continues...
Mythos Cards.description:
I cannot remember, I must not remember what I saw on that dark and foreboding night...
Shuffle the Mythos deck, being sure to include this card in it. After the deck is shuffled, draw a new Mythos card for the turn.

Mythos Cards.name: The terrible Experiment
Mythos Cards.description:
When this crad enters play, place 5 monsters from the cup on it. Any player may choose to fight one or more of these monsters while in the Misktonic U. streets during the Arkham Encounter Phase. If defeated, they are claimed as monster trophies. These monsters do not move, are not considered to be on the board, and do not count against the monster limit.
Ongoing Effect: Place a monster on this card at the end of every Mythos Phase (beginning the turn after it entered play).
Pass: If there are no monsters on this card, return it to the box. Eaach player draws 1 Skill.
Fail: If there are 8 monsters on this card, return it to the box. Raise the terror level to 10 and place the monsters that were on it into play in the Miskatoni U. streets.
Activity At:
Miskatonic U. Streets

Mythos Cards.name: Horror at Groundbreaking!
Mythos Cards.description: An ancient stone is disturbed by the construction, releasing 2 monsters into the Miskatonic U. streets.

Mythos Cards.name: Lodge Member Held for Questioning!
Mythos Cards.description: A Silver Lodge ritual lets 2 monsters loose in the French Hill streets.

Mythos Cards.name: Blood Magic
Mythos Cards.description:
Investigators who end their movement in the Rivertown streets may choose to delve into dark mysteries using their life force. Tehy roll dice equal to their current Stamina, and for every failed die, tehy lose 1 Stamina. If this reduces tehm to 0 Stamina, they are devoured and the player must start a new chareter. Otherwise, they gain 3 Clue tokens.
Activity At:
Rivertown Streets

Mythos Cards.name: The Chill of the Grave
Mythos Cards.description: All Undead monsters have their toughness increased by 1.
